channel.title: Public Broadcasting Act of 1967
channel.description:
A panel discussion on the Public Broadcasting Act of 1967. Moderated by Edgar Willis, former program associate for National Educational Television. Panelists: Edwin Burrows; Ben Yablonki; and William Pearce.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Panel discussion, part two
item.description: This program presents the second part of a panel discussion on the Public Broadcasting Act of 1967.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Public broadcasting

item.title: Panel discussion, part one
item.description: This program presents the first part of a panel discussion on the Public Broadcasting Act of 1967.
